source: The Israeli Labor Party ( , translit .
target:
以色列工党（希伯来语：מִפְלָגַת הָעֲבוֹדָה‎, translit. Mifleget haAvoda） is a center-left political party in Israel. It was founded in 1968 as a merger of several socialist and labor Zionist parties. Historically, it was the dominant party in Israeli politics, controlling the government for much of the country's early history. However, in recent decades, it has declined in popularity and influence, largely due to the rise of right-wing parties and the changing demographics of Israeli society. The party advocates for a two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, social justice, and economic equality. It is currently led by Merav Michaeli. Despite its decline, it remains a significant force in Israeli politics and is often part of coalition governments. The party's base of support traditionally comes from secular Jews, labor unions, and kibbutzim.



希伯来语：מִפְלָגַת הָעֲבוֹדָה‎, translit. Mifleget haAvoda）是以色列的一个中左翼政党。它成立于 1968 年，是几个社会主义和劳动先锋 Zionist 政党的合并体。历史上，它是以色列政治中占主导地位的政党，在以色列建国初期控制着政府很长一段时间。然而，在近几十年里，由于右翼政党的崛起和以色列社会人口结构的变化，它的受欢迎程度和影响力有所下降。该党倡导通过两国方案解决以巴冲突，追求社会公正和经济平等。目前由梅拉夫·米哈埃利领导。尽管有所衰落，它仍然是以色列政治中的一支重要力量，并且经常是联合政府的一部分。该党的支持基础传统上来自世俗犹太人、工会和集体农庄。

source: The Letter from Birmingham Jail , also known as the Letter from Birmingham City Jail and The Negro Is Your Brother , is an open letter written on April 16 , 1963 , by Martin Luther King Jr . The letter defends the strategy of nonviolent resistance to racism . It says that people have a moral responsibility to break unjust laws and to take direct action rather than waiting potentially forever for justice to come through the courts . Responding to being referred to as an `` outsider , '' King writes , `` Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere '' . The letter , written during the 1963 Birmingham campaign , was widely published , and became an important text for the American Civil Rights Movement .
target: 《伯明翰监狱来信》，也被称为《伯明翰市监狱来信》和《黑人是你的兄弟》，是马丁·路德·金于1963年4月16日写的一封公开信。信中捍卫了非暴力抵抗种族主义的策略。信中指出，人们有道德责任打破不公正的法律，并采取直接行动，而不是可能永远等待法院实现正义。对于被称为“局外人”的回应，金写道：“任何地方的不公正都是对所有地方正义的威胁。”这封信写于1963年伯明翰运动期间，广为传播，成为美国民权运动的重要文本。

source: Mohenjo - daro was built in the 26th century BCE . It was one of the largest cities of the ancient Indus Valley Civilization , also known as the Harappan Civilization , which developed around 3,000 BCE from the prehistoric Indus culture . At its height , the Indus Civilization spanned much of what is now Pakistan and North India , extending westwards to the Iranian border , south to Gujarat in India and northwards to an outpost in Bactria , with major urban centers at Harappa , Mohenjo - daro , Lothal , Kalibangan , Dholavira and Rakhigarhi . Mohenjo - daro was the most advanced city of its time , with remarkably sophisticated civil engineering and urban planning . When the Indus civilization went into sudden decline around 1900 BCE , Mohenjo - daro was abandoned . The ruins of the city remained undocumented for around 3,700 years until R.D. Banerji , an officer of the Archaeological Survey of India , visited the site in 1919 -- 20 , identifying the Buddhist stupa ( 150 -- 500 CE ) known to be there and finding a flint scraper which convinced him of the site 's antiquity . This led to large - scale excavations of Mohenjo - daro led by Kashinath Narayan Dikshit in 1924 -- 25 , and John Marshall in 1925 -- 26 . In the 1930s , major excavations were conducted at the site under the leadership of Marshall , D.K. Dikshitar and Ernest Mackay . Further excavations were carried out in 1945 by Ahmad Hasan Dani and Mortimer Wheeler . The last major series of excavations were conducted in 1964 and 1965 by Dr. George F. Dales .
target: 莫亨佐-达罗是在公元前26世纪建造的。它是古代印度河谷文明（也称哈拉帕文明）最大的城市之一，印度河谷文明大约在公元前3000年从史前印度河文化发展而来。在其鼎盛时期，印度河文明覆盖了现在巴基斯坦和北印度的大部分地区，向西延伸到伊朗边境，向南延伸到印度的古吉拉特邦，向北延伸到巴克特里亚的前哨站，主要城市中心分别是哈拉帕、莫亨佐-达罗、洛塔尔、卡利班甘、德霍拉维拉和拉基加尔希。莫亨佐-达罗是当时最先进的城市，具有非常先进的土木工程和城市规划。印度河文明在公元前1900年左右突然衰落，莫亨佐-达罗被废弃。城市的遗址在3700多年里没有被记录，直到1919-20年，印度考古调查局的官员R.D. Banerji访问了该遗址，确认了当地的佛塔（公元150-500年）并发现了一件石刮刀，这使他相信该遗址的古老性。这导致了1924-25年由Kashinath Narayan Dikshit领导和1925-26年由John Marshall领导的大规模挖掘。20世纪30年代，在Marshall、D.K. Dikshitar和Ernest Mackay的领导下，对该遗址进行了大规模的挖掘。1945年，Ahmad Hasan Dani和Mortimer Wheeler进行了进一步的挖掘。最后一次大规模挖掘是在1964年和1965年由乔治·F·戴尔斯博士进行的。

source: When he would tour , staying in hotels , `` the rooms would be remodeled in advance of his arrival , so as to make the same configurations of space as he had at home -- the Graceland mansion . His furniture would arrive , and he could unwind after his performances in surroundings which were completely familiar and comforting , '' the room in question , ' The Jungle Room ' being `` an example of particularly lurid kitsch . '' On August 16 , 1977 , Presley died in the bathroom at Graceland allegedly of a heart attack . Elvis Presley lay in state in a 900 - pound copper - lined coffin just inside the foyer while over 3,500 of Elvis ' mourning fans passed by to pay their respects . A private funeral with 200 mourners was held on August 18 , 1977 in the house , with the casket placed in front of the stained glass doorway of the music room . Graceland continued to be occupied by members of the family until the death of Elvis ' aunt Delta in 1993 , who had moved in at Elvis ' invitation after her husband 's death . Elvis ' daughter , Lisa Marie Presley , inherited the estate in 1993 when she turned 25 . Presley , his parents Gladys & Vernon Presley , and his grandmother Minnie Mae Presley are buried on the property in the Meditation Garden . A memorial gravestone for Presley 's stillborn twin brother , Jesse Garon , is also at the site . Graceland was listed in the National Register of Historic Places on November 7 , 1991 and designated a National Historic Landmark on March 27 , 2006 Graceland was the first site related to rock and roll to be entered in the National Register of Historic Places .
target: 当他巡演并在酒店住宿时，“他的房间会在他到达之前提前翻新，以使其空间配置与他在家的格雷斯兰豪宅相同。他的家具会运到，他可以在完全熟悉和舒适的环境中在演出后放松，” 提到的房间，“丛林屋”就是一个“特别艳俗的俗气例子”。1977年8月16日，普雷斯利在格雷斯兰的浴室里被认为因心脏病发作而去世。埃尔维斯·普雷斯利躺在一个900磅重的铜制棺材里，就在门厅内，超过3500名哀悼的粉丝前来瞻仰遗容。一场有200名哀悼者参加的私人葬礼于1977年8月18日在房子里举行，棺材被放置在音乐室的彩色玻璃门前。格雷斯兰一直被家人居住，直到1993年埃尔维斯的阿姨戴尔塔去世，她是在她丈夫去世后应埃尔维斯的邀请搬进去的。埃尔维斯的女儿丽莎·玛丽·普雷斯利在1993年她25岁时继承了遗产。普雷斯利、他的父母格拉迪斯和弗农·普雷斯利，以及他的祖母米妮·梅·普雷斯利被埋葬在房产内的冥想花园。普雷斯利死产的双胞胎弟弟杰西·加伦的纪念墓碑也在该地点。格雷斯兰于1991年11月7日被列入国家历史名录，并于2006年3月27日被指定为国家历史地标。格雷斯兰是第一个与摇滚乐相关的被列入国家历史名录的地点。

source: Alternating current ( AC ) is an electric current which periodically reverses direction , in contrast to direct current ( DC ) which flows only in one direction . Alternating current is the form in which electric power is delivered to businesses and residences , and it is the form of electrical energy that consumers typically use when they plug kitchen appliances , televisions and electric lamps into a wall socket . A common source of DC power is a battery cell in a flashlight . The abbreviations AC and DC are often used to mean simply alternating and direct , as when they modify current or voltage . The usual waveform of alternating current in most electric power circuits is a sine wave . In certain applications , different waveforms are used , such as triangular or square waves . Audio and radio signals carried on electrical wires are also examples of alternating current . These types of alternating current carry information encoded ( or modulated ) onto the AC signal , such as sound ( audio ) or images ( video ) . These currents typically alternate at higher frequencies than those used in power transmission .
target: 交流电（AC）是一种周期性改变方向的电流，与只朝一个方向流动的直流电（DC）形成对比。交流电是电力输送到企业及住宅的形式，也是消费者将厨房用具、电视机和电灯插入墙上的插座时通常使用的电能形式。一个常见的直流电源是手电筒中的电池。缩写 AC 和 DC 常常用来简单表示交流和直流，例如当它们修饰电流或电压时。在大多数电力电路中，交流电的常用波形为正弦波。在某些应用中，会使用不同的波形，例如三角波或方波。通过电线传输的音频和无线电信号也是交流电的例子。这些类型的交流电将信息编码（或调制）到交流信号中，例如声音（音频）或图像（视频）。这些电流的频率通常高于用于电力传输的频率。

source: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
target: 彗星可能是向地球输送水源的来源之一，同时也携带有机物质，这些有机物质可以形成蛋白质并支持生命。科学家们希望了解行星是如何形成的，特别是地球的形成，因为彗星很久以前曾与地球相撞。

source: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
target: 巅峰时期，命名为“冈努”的热带气旋，其名称来源于马尔代夫语中的一种棕榈叶袋，风速达到每小时240公里（149英里）。截至今日早晨，风速已降至每小时83公里，预计将继续减弱。

source: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

source: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. target: 这不仅证实了至少某些恐龙长有羽毛，这一理论早已广为流传，而且提供了化石通常无法提供的细节，例如颜色和三维排列。科学家表示，这种动物的羽毛上部呈栗色，下部为浅色或类胡萝卜素颜色。这一发现还揭示了鸟类羽毛进化的相关信息。由于这些恐龙羽毛没有发育良好的羽轴（称为羽茎），但确实具备羽毛的其他特征——羽枝和羽小枝——研究人员推断，羽茎很可能是后来才进化出的特征。羽毛的结构表明，它们并非用于飞行，而是用于体温调节或展示。研究人员指出，尽管这是幼年恐龙的尾巴，但样本显示的是成年羽毛，而不是幼鸟的绒毛。研究人员指出，尽管这是幼年恐龙的尾巴，但样本显示的是成年羽毛，而不是幼鸟的绒毛。

source: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. source: Jens Oliver Lisberg ( 24 December 1896 – 31 August 1920 ) ( Jens Olivur Lisberg in modern Faroese ) is one of the designers of the Merkið , the flag of the Faroe Islands . While a law student in Copenhagen , he devised the flag in 1919 with two other Faroese students , Janus Øssursson from Tórshavn and Paul Dahl from Vágur . Lisberg raised the flag for the first time on Faroese soil on 22 June 1919 on returning to his home town of Fámjin . It would not however receive official status until 25 April 1940 when the British occupation government approved its use as the civil ensign of the islands . Lisberg died of pneumonia on 31 August 1920 . He is buried in Fámjin , where the church now holds the original copy of the Merkið .
target: 延斯·奥利弗·利斯贝格（Jens Oliver Lisberg，1896年12月24日－1920年8月31日）（现代法罗语称Jens Olivur Lisberg）是法罗群岛旗帜“Merkið”的设计者之一。1919年，他在哥本哈根作为一名法律系学生，与另外两名法罗群岛学生——来自托尔斯港的贾纳斯·厄苏尔森（Janus Øssursson）和来自瓦乌尔的保罗·达尔（Paul Dahl）——共同设计了这面旗帜。1919年6月22日，利斯贝格首次在法罗群岛本土的法姆因镇升起了这面旗帜。然而，直到1940年4月25日，英国占领政府批准其作为法罗群岛民用旗帜使用时，该旗帜才获得官方认可。利斯贝格于1920年8月31日因肺炎去世，葬于法姆因教堂内，教堂现收藏有“Merkið”的原始版本。

source: I don't ever want to see another generation of young Americans bleed their lives into sandy beachheads in the Pacific, or rice paddies and jungles in the in Asia or the muddy battlefields of Europe. Mr. Stone, I have submitted an economic plan that I have worked out in concert with a number of fine economists in this country, all of whom approve it, and believe that over a five year projection, this plan can permit the extra spending for needed refurbishing of our defensive posture, that it can provide for a balanced budget by 1983 if not earlier, and that we can afford - along with the cuts that I have proposed in Government. spending - we can afford the tax cuts I have proposed and probably mainly because Mr. Carter's economic policy has built into the next five years, and on beyond that, a tax increase that will be taking $86 billion more out of the people's pockets than was taken this year.
target: 我不希望看到另一代年轻的美国人将他们的生命洒在太平洋的沙滩上，或是亚洲的稻田和丛林中，或是欧洲的泥泞战场上。斯通先生，我已经提交了一份经济计划，这是我与该国许多优秀的经济学家一起制定的，他们都同意这一计划，并且相信，在五年的预测中，这个计划可以允许我们为必要的国防军事态势改善提供额外的开支，它可以在1983年或更早之前实现平衡预算，我们可以承担——除了我提出的政府开支削减——我们可以承担我提出的税收削减，主要是因为卡特先生的经济政策已经为未来五年甚至更长时间内制定了税收增加的计划，这将比今年多从人民的口袋中拿出860亿美元。

source: On 27 September 2014, Toshney signed for Ross County and made his debut the same day as they beat Dundee 2--1. Having been released by Ross County, Toshney signed for Cowdenbeath on 3 February 2015, signing a contract until the end of the 2014--15 season. On 11 June 2015, Toshney signed for Raith Rovers. Following his move to Scottish Championship rivals Dundee United, former Raith Rovers manager Ray McKinnon expressed an interest in bringing Toshney to Tannadice.
target: 2014年9月27日，托尼签约罗斯郡，并在当天以2-1战胜邓迪的比赛中完成首秀。在被罗斯郡解约后，托尼于2015年2月3日加盟科登比思，签订了一份持续到2014-15赛季结束的合同。2015年6月11日，托尼签约雷思流浪者队。在他转会到苏冠联赛对手邓迪联队后，雷思流浪者队前主教练雷·麦克诺顿表示有兴趣将托尼带到坦纳迪斯球场。

source: Suanna Wallumr*d has cooperated with exceptional baroque harpist Giovanna Pessi, who has previously made herself known with a variety of ECM recordings. Pessi's collaboration with pianist Christian Wallumr*d brought her regularly to Oslo, where she met and became friends with Susanna, the pianist's sister. Susanna invited Pessi to play on her solo album Sonata Mix Dwarf Cosmos (2008), and four years later, the Norwegian vocalist's turn to take guest role.
target: Suanna Wallumr*d 与杰出的巴洛克竖琴演奏家 Giovanna Pessi 合作过，后者以前因多张 ECM 唱片而广为人知。Pessi 与钢琴家 Christian Wallumr*d 的合作使她经常来到奥斯陆，在那里她结识并成为了 Susanna（钢琴家的妹妹）的朋友。Susanna 邀请 Pessi 参与她的个人专辑《Sonata Mix Dwarf Cosmos》（2008）的演奏，四年后，这位挪威歌手也轮到客串出演客座角色。
